properties.name: Exclusive Resort Style Acreage Home of Distinction
properties.description:
The enquiry code for this property is 1082
Please note this 4 digit code very carefully as it is required for all enquiries.

Location
This home is situated in a prestige modern acreage estate in Bridgeman Downs. The natural environment is preserved and luxury homes sit amongst open spaces with rolling hills, woodlands and creeks, located within 13km of Brisbane’s CBD.

The property
The 10,000m2 property is located in a very accessible yet secluded position at the end of a cul-de-sac. Its natural vista is northerly towards a broad frontage open space through which Albany Creek flows and is preserved in its natural state for all time. You will enjoy the amenity of the open grassed meadow dotted with mature conifers and eucalypts which would also make an ideal home for a horse and stable.

The dwelling
Built in 2005 and offering a discerning blend of traditional and modern features, this bespoke home provides for a range of living styles. Automated gates open to an inviting entrance featuring fountains, decoratively carved stone seating and life-sized marble figures. 

The double entry doors open onto a foyer that leads into an expansive living space with featured cathedral ceilings, that joins seamlessly through custom made multi-folding doors to a spacious semi-outdoor area and on to the in-ground pool. The northerly aspect and extensive use of glass provide a bright living space that connects with the natural surrounds. The primary living spaces have the capacity for extensive social entertaining functions, whilst also facilitating privacy and seclusion in a natural setting for those quiet solitary times. 

The kitchen and dining areas are created for the serious home gourmet with a huge granite topped island bench, two pack cabinetry, European appliances and walk-in pantry and is designed to integrate with both the internal and external living areas.
The outdoor living space is over 300m2 with 150m2 under roof or shade sail, tiled with travertine and incorporating fountains with life sized carved marble features, and a salt water pool with built in spa.

Located in the east wing, the master bedroom is discretely separated from the other sleeping areas and is expansive, containing a sitting area and separate his and hers walk in robes. The floors are of inlaid polished marble complimenting the decorative columns and contiguous with the ensuite. The master ensuite is spacious, lined with inlaid polished marble and features a luxury two person therapeutic spa, twin basin marble topped Italian made vanity, separate toilet, and a large open double shower incorporating built in seating and a luxurious rain shower head.

The east wing also contains a formal lounge where quiet discussions can be enjoyed in comfort.
The west wing contains an additional tree double bedrooms which adjoin a generous entertainment room which connects through a multi-sliding door to the outdoor area, the perfect haven for the children or guests to occupy themselves. The main bathroom is fitted with a king sized bath, roomy shower and marble topped Italian made vanity and generous linen cupboard. The west wing also includes an additional ensuite and two separate toilets.

A further surprise awaits as a staircase leads to a huge loft over the garage, currently set up as a games room but would also be an ideal studio, media room or centre for home business.
The tiled garage is accessed through remote controlled doors and accommodates three cars with ease. It has two separate storage rooms, built-in storage cupboards, and a project/hobby work area with work bench.
The paved driveway leads to a 70m2 shed with a high roof to accommodate a boat, caravan, or vehicle hoist. It has 3 phase power, a built in room, and mezzanine floor.

Features:
· Master bedroom with double WIRs, sitting area, marble floors
· Master ensuite with spa featuring polished marble
· Three additional double bedrooms, one with ensuite
· Main bathroom with floor to ceiling tiles, marble vanity
· Separate office/study
· Separate living room, formal lounge, and rumpus room
· Formal dining area
· Covered Alfresco dining
· In ground pool with spa and covered pergola
· Gourmet’s kitchen with stone bench top, European appliances
· Automated entry gates with asphalt paved driveway
· Seven car undercover accommodation
· Steel framed construction
· Solar hot water
· Three bay work shed with high roof and 3 phase power
· 22,000 litre stainless steel rainwater tank

This beautiful family home in a sought after pocket of Leeming has it all. The king-sized master bedroom features his and hers built-in robes and an ensuite with a large shower & separate toilet. Off the master is a double living area currently used as a formal lounge/reading room and separate formal dining room. One of these areas could easily be set up as a study if preferred. 

Looking out over the open plan living/family/dining room, the functional kitchen features a dishwasher, gas hotplate and a large picture window that opens to one of outdoor entertaining areas.

The third living area is enormous and could be set up as a family, games or theatre room. It features a computer nook and can be completely closed off from the other living area but still be visible from the family room through a feature internal window.

The three minor bedrooms at the rear of the house are all double sized and separated from the master bedroom by the living areas. One of the minor bedrooms is currently used as a study. There is a large family bathroom with bath. The laundry features a walk-in storage cupboard and a built-in linen cupboard.

Enchanting gardens completely surround the home on all sides creating complete privacy and beautiful views from every window. The gardens practically look after themselves, being fully reticulated from a newly installed bore. There is even room for a pool.

Large undercover pergolas extend from two sides at the rear of the house and are surrounded by lush greenery creating beautiful 'outdoor rooms'. The backyard is completely enclosed with a wide, sliding side gate from the carport which gives access for a boat or trailer. A good-sized shed/workshop completes the picture.

Other features include:
- Ducted reverse cycle air-conditioning to the master bedroom and all living areas
